description:
When you Create a client in group using the App, The created client appears not to be belonging to any group ie, The App has no ability to manage client creation in a group.

1) Go to left navigation bar, then selct any group.
2) Tap on right top corner menu, then select 'Group Clients' 
3) Then tap on '+' button, enter all details and submit. 
Expected: The client should be created within the group.
Observed: The client is created outside the group.
name: Mifos Android Client Bug Fix: Adding Client In a group Issue
